application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Side basement extension; ground floor rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); rear roof extension, and installation of five solar panels to side roof slope (following removal of existing rear dormer); alterations to the internal layout of existing dwelling house.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s)

470 - P 01 Proposed Location and Block Plan, 470 - P 02 Existing Floor Plans, 470 - P 03 Existing Floor Plans Sheet 2, 470 - P 05 Existing Elevations, 470 - P 10 Proposed Floor Plans - Sheet 1, 470 - P 11 rev C Proposed Floor Plans - Sheet 2, 470 - P 15 rev D Proposed Elevations, 470 - P16 Section 02
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B  and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021 | No part of the roof of the ground floor rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall be conservation style roof light that are level with the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and preserve or enhance the heritage asset and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
